get.description: Get a paginated list of published blog posts. Only published posts are returned.

parameters.name: match_all

schema.description: If true, posts must have ALL tags (AND). If false, posts must have ANY tag (OR)
schema.title: Match All

parameters.description: If true, posts must have ALL tags (AND). If false, posts must have ANY tag (OR)

get.summary: Get a published blog post by slug (Public)
get.description: Get a single published blog post by its slug. Returns 404 if post is not published or not found.
Get all published posts in a specific category

get.summary: Get published posts by tag slug (Public)
get.description: Get all published posts with a specific tag
Get a paginated list of all active categories
Get a single category by its ID, including all children categories
Get a paginated list of all active tags
Get a single tag by its ID
Get a single tag by its slug

Get all blog posts with optional multi-tag filtering

- **tag_ids**: Filter posts by tag IDs (e.g., ?tag_ids=id1&tag_ids=id2)
- **tag_names**: Filter posts by tag names (e.g., ?tag_names=python&tag_names=fastapi)
- **match_all**: 
    - `true` (default): Posts must have ALL specified tags (AND logic)
    - `false`: Posts must have ANY of the specified tags (OR logic)

parameters.name: match_all

schema.description: If true, posts must have ALL tags (AND). If false, posts must have ANY tag (OR)
schema.title: Match All

parameters.description: If true, posts must have ALL tags (AND). If false, posts must have ANY tag (OR)

get.summary: Get a blog post by ID
get.description: Get a blog post by ID

patch.description: Publish a blog post (change status to published)
Unpublish a blog post (change status back to draft)

post.description: User login - creates a new session and invalidates any existing session
User logout - invalidates the current session token

get.description:
Get current user profile
Requires: Bearer token in Authorization header

List all users
Requires: Admin role

patch.description:
Update user information
- Admin can update any user
- Non-admin can only update themselves

post.description:
Lock a user account (admin only).
This action is logged for audit purposes.

Unlock a user account (admin only).
Resets all lockout-related fields: locked, failed_attempts, locked_until.
This action is logged for audit purposes.

patch.description:
Change user password
- Admin can change any user's password
- Non-admin can only change their own password
- Requires old password for verification
- All existing sessions will be invalidated after password change
